title: GeForce Now rolls out Fortnite with touch controls to everyone on Android and iOS
content:
Playing Fortnite on mobile phones is about to get a lot better, as Nvidia GeForce Now is rolling out support for the full hit game with touch controls on both Android and iOS.

moreâ€¦

The post GeForce Now rolls out Fortnite with touch controls to everyone on Android and iOS appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Available now, Nvidia's GeForce Now has added support for Epic Games' Fortnite with full touch controls on Android and iOS.
